mapper.insert: INSERT INTO personallog.comment( user_id, article_id, content, parent_id, status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{articleId}, #{content}, #{parentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, article_id, content, parent_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM personallog.comment WHERE id = #{commentId} AND status != 0
SELECT id, user_id, article_id, content, parent_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM personallog.comment WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status != 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, user_id, article_id, content, parent_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM personallog.comment WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND status != 0 ORDER BY create_time ASC

SELECT id, user_id, article_id, content, parent_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM personallog.comment WHERE article_id = #{articleId} AND (parent_id = 0 OR parent_id IS NULL) AND status != 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT id, user_id, article_id, content, parent_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM personallog.comment WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status != 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT id, user_id, article_id, content, parent_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM personallog.comment WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND status != 0 ORDER BY create_time ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM personallog.comment WHERE article_id = #{articleId} AND status != 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM personallog.comment WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status != 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM personallog.comment WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND status != 0

SELECT id, user_id, article_id, content, parent_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM personallog.comment WHERE status != 0 AND content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE personallog.comment SET status = 0, update_time = NOW() WHERE status != 0 AND content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.article_id, c.content, c.parent_id, c.status, c.create_time, c.update_time, a.title as article_title FROM personallog.comment c LEFT JOIN personallog.article a ON c.article_id = a.id WHERE c.id = #{commentId} AND c.status != 0
